value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh... It was useless... I'm a failure...$k$pA total and abject failure!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander Anna?! Was that you
shouting in here? What's wrong?
You look like you've seen a ghost!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That Sounds of the Ocean tome... I
don't think anybody is buying it. And
I mean that quite literally.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|"Relax to the sounds of crashing
waves..." What a joke! I'm a joke! My
whole life has been a joke!$k$p$EFace_Cool|No... No, that's not true! I'm not a
failure—I'm a saleswoman! And a true
saleswoman always bounces back!$k$pI just need a new plan... And I've got
it! There's a light at the end of this
tunnel!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|(I'm glad she's capable of helping
herself, but even I've never seen the
commander this manic...)$k$pWhat's your new idea, Commander?
Can I help?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We're going to draw them! We'll
capture the allure of summering
Heroes with quill and parchment!$k$pThere's no way something like that
won't sell. It's so...so... Artisanal!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|But won't the other Anna charge a fee
for using their likenesses?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We'll keep costs down by doing the
work ourselves. We'll save money in
the long run! I'm talking pure profit!$k$pYou bring the quills, parchment, and
your can-do attitude, and I'll go learn
how to draw!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Swim18,Face|I just love how easy it is to move
around in this. Maybe I'll incorporate
it into my armor somehow.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_F_Swim18,Face|It is easy to move in, but doesn't it
seem like we could be better dressed
for battle?$k$p$WmMPID_水着カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Swim18,Face|Linde, I'm surprised! Your usual outfit
isn't exactly...modest...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_F_Swim18,Face|That outfit is very special to me,
Camilla. It's entirely different from
wearing this!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_F_Swim18,Face|I just can't get used to fighting in this.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Swim18,Face|Sweet child. It's clear to me you're
struggling. Come, let the two of us
retreat for now.$k$p$Sbs150|
